name: Prosperity
description: Take on the role of leading a camp of weary peasants, make strategic decisions to fight for survival against the elements. If you're capable, the camp will grow into a settlement, and then a hamlet. Do you have what it takes to grow it into a city?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
